text: Erik Clausen (7 March 1942 â€“ 30 October 2024) was a Danish actor, movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Copenhagen, Denmark. His career lasted from 1978 until 2019. He directed and starred in the 2007 movie Temporary Release which was shown at the Moscow International Film Festival. As an actor, he appeared in In the Middle of the Night. As a director, he directed The Dark Side of the Moon.
